title: Add git short hash to version string when available
Make selected helper structs public
body: This PR makes selected helper structs public so that they are available to use in other crates.

title: Major restructure of the library to provide new, non-CLI API
body:
I attempted to break this restructure up into two changesets, but it wasn't feasible, so this PR includes the changes implementing many new types (breaking the dependency on `casper-types` and `casper-execution-engine`) and restructuring the code to provide the new Rust API.

Closes #[2769](https://github.com/casper-network/casper-node/issues/2771).
Closes #[2771](https://github.com/casper-network/casper-node/issues/2771).

title: Update dependencies
body:
This PR updates all third party dependencies, with the bulk of the changes being around clap v3.

It is built on top of #14 so only the second commit is relevant to this PR.

Closes [#2770](https://github.com/casper-network/casper-node/issues/2770).

title: Remove C library support
body:
This PR removes the C library bindings.

Closes [#2772](https://github.com/casper-network/casper-node/issues/2772).

title: CI: add dev branch as matrix
body:
attempting to run nightly test on dev

Related Post: https://github.community/t/scheduled-builds-of-non-default-branch/16306/24

Ticket: https://app.zenhub.com/workspaces/cn-sre-60d363546afb85000e491ff6/issues/casper-network/sre/365

title: ZH-SRE-359: Add Dev branch to CI
body:
Changes:
- Turns CI on for dev branch
- various lint fixes from fmt & clippy

title: Merge feat-fast-sync changes -> dev
body:
Changes:
- merges changes from `feat-fast-sync` -> `dev`
    - reverted the git branch changes in `Cargo.toml`  back to dev in https://github.com/casper-ecosystem/casper-client-rs/commit/6f4ea7b1ecafb98fdf6d1bcaede4cf676c60cce4
    - reverted change to allow deploy to be borrowed in: https://github.com/casper-ecosystem/casper-client-rs/pull/11/commits/1ce232c2e17b504ab32ad713129fe4fd0e31b981

title: Update to match changes in casper-node due to fast-sync feature
body:
This PR makes the `feat-fast-sync` branch compatible with the same branch of `casper-node`.

Many of the JSON-specific types have been copied here as the first step to breaking the dependency of the client on the node library.

In the near future, an approach should be settled to allow testing that the copied types stay in sync.

title: ZH-SRE-I236: Upload to debian repository
body:
## Changes:
- `ci/publish_deb_to_repo.sh`
    - Adds bash wrapper used by CI for uploading signed packages to s3.
- `.github/workflows/publish-casper-client-deb.yml`
    - Updated to call bash wrapper as step
    - Invalidates Cloudfront used by repo
    - Adds GPG Keys needed for signing
    - Adds aptly and awscli deps

## Misc RPM Related Changes:
- updates rpm bash wrapper name

## Test Runs from my fork: 
- 12.0.0 -> https://github.com/TomVasile/casper-client-rs/actions/runs/1655042468
- 12.1.1 -> https://github.com/TomVasile/casper-client-rs/actions/runs/1655336248

## Test Verification:
- 20.04 (focal) top, 18.04 (bionic) bottom
    - ![cli_focal_top_bionic_bottom](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43349666/148128169-88d9c69d-1662-4bbb-aa8b-939447967a45.PNG)

title: Port recent changes from casper-node repo
body: This ports recent changes made to the client in the casper-node repo.

title: CI: add os in slack title to differentiate
body:
Adds:
- change slack notification title to call out OS.

title: ZH-SRE-I250: initial commit of nightly scheduled test
body:
Adds:
- `.github/workflows/nightly-scheduled-test.yml`
    - runs `cargo test` nightly at `midnight` on both `18.04` and `20.04`
    - status of job written to slack

Non-related change:
- switch `.github/workflows/ci-casper-client-rs.yml` to `20.04` directly instead of `latest`

Ticket: https://app.zenhub.com/workspaces/cn-sre-60d363546afb85000e491ff6/issues/casper-network/sre/250
Epic: https://app.zenhub.com/workspaces/cn-sre-60d363546afb85000e491ff6/issues/casper-network/sre/233

title: CI: initial commit of ci and publish piplines
body:
Adds:
- `ci-casper-client-rs.yml`
    - utilizes matrix build for ubuntu 18.04/20.04
- `publish-casper-client-rs.yml`
    - will publish to crates.io

Notes: There's more to come for publishing but will need to be worked out incrementally. See Epic: https://app.zenhub.com/workspaces/cn-sre-60d363546afb85000e491ff6/issues/casper-network/sre/233
